title: Workshop on Learning Pattern Analysis and Strategy Development Using Digital Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and practical experience in social sector fields
context.additional_context: Learners analyze digital learning patterns using personal devices (BYOD) and explore practical application strategies through offline collaborative activities. Assessment materials are primarily collected through summative evaluation, with a focus on developing learning resource utilization strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can classify their learning patterns into three types (deep/strategic/surface) by analyzing digital tool usage data.
Learners can design and apply strategic methods to utilize learning management systems (LMS) and digital library resources.
Learners can collaboratively develop effective digital learning strategies through peer feedback exchanges.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
